citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Major operative surgeries are conducted at the facility, most recently in early April 2024. The surgical area was found in
non-aseptic conditions, including a bottle of disinfecting cleanser on a surgical suite window ledge and the presence of
non-sterile surgical tools, suture, and used syringes. This does not adhere to the standard of care for these procedures.
Major operative procedures must be conducted in dedicated surgical areas which are maintained in aseptic conditions to
meet standards of care and best practice. The facility must maintain the surgical areas in aseptic conditions.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.31(d)(1)(ix)  Repeat
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
Major operative surgeries are conducted at the facility, most recently in early April 2024. The surgical area was found in 
non-aseptic conditions, including a bottle of disinfecting cleanser on a surgical suite window ledge and the presence of 
non-sterile surgical tools, suture, and used syringes. This does not adhere to the standard of care for these procedures. 
Major operative procedures must be conducted in dedicated surgical areas which are maintained in aseptic conditions to 
meet standards of care and best practice. The facility must maintain the surgical areas in aseptic conditions. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
